title: Understanding Centralized Tagging
text: Consider the benefits of having a single, unified system for tagging data. How might this help in organizing and retrieving information efficiently?

title: Exploring the Downsides
text: Think about the potential risks or challenges that might arise from centralizing the tagging process. Could it lead to any issues with flexibility or adaptability?

hintAnswer: Centralizing tagging can improve consistency but may reduce flexibility.
title: Evaluating Both Sides
text: List one advantage and one disadvantage of centralizing tagging. Consider how these factors might impact the overall data management strategy.
